name: Home Service - 6 Months
description: For those who live in a permanent dwelling such as a home or an apartment.

name: Recycling Service - Businesses
description: This is an upgraded service for businesses and offices in the Provo/Orem area. Unlike the student service option, the business recycling option is done on a monthly rather than semester basis. As a business you have the option of paying monthly payments or in full. To get this service please email us at juicylimerecycling@gmail.com and we will send one of our trusted members out to your business to give you an estimate. Normal businesses will be charged $19.99 a month and 2.99 extra for sensitive document shredding upon request.

name: Recycling Service - Students
description: Everyone knows and understands that recycling is important. Everyone would recycle if recycling were more accessible and easy. We know this and our mission is to bring a convenient recycling option for concerned and responsible BYU off-campus housing students. We want to make recycling bigger but we can only get so far without your help. Join us today and start making a difference.
